item.description: This Friday night, October 5th, we will be throwing down the jams at the Stonebridge Restaurant, located at 50 Daniel St. in downtown Milford, CT, their phone: (203) 874-7947. Don't wanna miss this show, especially if our previous show is any indication...OMG, whatta night that was when hundreds packed into the Stonebridge for one helluva booty shakin' party!!!Putting the word out to all of our friends to head on out to the Stonebridge this Friday night and let's throw down another party like we did last time...showtime at 10:00...bring your dancing shoes too!!!  And while you're at it, bring your appetite with you also, cuz the Stonebridge has a well deserved reputation as one of the finest restaurants in Milford.  C'mon out to the Stonebridge this Friday night...we wanna see your face in the place!!!  For more info on the Stonebridge, visit their website at: http://www.stonebridgerestaurant.com/

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Let's Dance the Night Away @ Stonebridge With The Bernadette's
